attributes.action: Give John Surtees OBE a Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: If anyone deserves a knighthood for their sporting achievements its John Surtees.
attributes.background: John Surtees is the only man in history to win multiple championship at the highest level of motorsports on a motorbike and car. He won the Formula 1 world championship with Ferrari in 1964 and the Motorcycle world championship 4 times, in 1956, 1958, 1959 and 1960.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

You don't need to start a petition on this site to do that: members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. 

You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: https://www.gov.uk/honours
